draft.title: SMARTYPANTS Halloween Food Puns Mug - Funny Spooky Comic Artwork Cup with Black Handle - Novelty Vintage Doodle Kitchen Drinkware - Humorous Horror Gift for Men Women - Office Tea Joke Present
draft.description:
Start your day with a scream... of laughter! This hilariously spooky mug from SMARTYPANTS is the perfect brew companion for anyone who loves a good pun and a touch of vintage comic style. Featuring four unique panels of food-based horror humour—including the ghostly 'Boorito' and the terrified 'Panic Cotta'—this mug is a guaranteed conversation starter in any kitchen or office.

Crafted from high-quality ceramic with a striking black handle and rim, it’s not just about the looks. This cup is built for daily enjoyment, being both dishwasher and microwave safe. Whether you're treating yourself or searching for the perfect funny gift for a friend, colleague, or family member, this mug delivers a delightful dose of wit with every sip of tea or coffee.

bullets: Spooky Foodie Humour – Perfect for Halloween lovers and pun enthusiasts this mug features four hilarious comic-style food doodles like 'Boorito' and 'Panic Cotta' for a daily laugh.
Premium Ceramic Quality – Crafted from durable white ceramic this 11oz mug has a high-gloss finish and a stylish black handle and rim making your beverage time a treat.
Everyday Convenience – Designed for your busy lifestyle this sturdy cup is completely microwave safe for reheating drinks and dishwasher safe for effortless cleaning after use.
Lasting Artwork – The quirky vintage comic design is printed with advanced techniques ensuring the black and white artwork remains sharp vibrant and fade-resistant for years.
Versatile Gift Idea – Arriving ready for gifting this unique mug is an ideal choice for the home kitchen or office desk making it a great Secret Santa or birthday present.
